    • Method Detail

      • hasFocus

        public static boolean hasFocus(java.awt.Component component)
        Returns:
        true if javax.swing.SwingUtilities.findFocusOwner(component) != null

      • hasFocus2

        public static boolean hasFocus2(java.awt.Component component)
        Returns:
        true if window ancestor of component was most recent focused window and most recent focused component in that window was descended from component
